title: Industrial Factory, Nibong Tebal, Penang
description: No.1177, Jalan Besar, Datuk Keramat, 14300 Nibong Tebal, Penang. Title: GM 975, GM 454, GM 455, GM 456 & GM 1696. Land: 10.38 acres total. Build-up: 21,622 sqm (232,675 sf) — 1-storey factory 19,190 sqm, 3-storey office 1,441 sqm, 2-storey office 929 sqm, guard house, TNB substation. Ceiling: ridge 37.5ft, eave 28.3ft. Power: 800 amp. Floor load: min 2 ton/m². Industrial use, freehold. Current status: Own Use. Asking RM 60,000,000 (negotiable). Viewing by arrangement only (PIC: Jeffery Lim 016-8237138); at least 1 day advance notice. Sold as is where is. Map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/ukfZmKCTAqBNY6mN8
